name: Gryphon Investors
overview: Gryphon Investors is a highly respected private equity firm with more than $900 million in assets under management (AUM) focused on middle market investment opportunities. Backed by the teamâ€™s deep operational expertise and a focused industry investment strategy, Gryphon has delivered exceptional results for all stakeholders. Since its founding in 1995, Gryphon has partnered with existing management teams, making investments of $25 to $75 million, and worked together with management to build new market leaders.

offices.address1: One Market Plaza, Steuart Tower, 24th Floor
